relation: Darrow - #40 If a man yells loud enough, he can do anything! The magic words to unleash a hero's true potential brings about the saving grace Ness needed. However, just channeling energy isn't enough, especially when you still don't have a cool attack name.
Darrow - #41 The legendary PSI Rockin' is realized at last! Ness comes to understand his true power and unleashes a finishing blow on the Titanic Ant.
Darrow - #42 Titanic Ant says his farewell, or at least tries to. Also, Ness finally makes it to his first sanctuary.

Darrow - #43 Ness discovers the purpose of the Sound Stone - It records awesome music! After recording the melody, Ness proceeds to the internet where he proceeds to record countless copyrighted music. Unfortunately for him, the police are onto his every move.
Darrow - #44 Ness shows off his rebellious side and as a result ends up on Eagleland's Most Wanted. It wasn't him! It was the four armed monster ant!
